mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clubs(clubName, clubCode, clubDate, ownerId) values(#{clubName}, #{clubCode}, sysdate, #{ownerId})
mapper.update: update tbl_clubs set clubName = #{clubName} where clubCode = #{clubCode}
update tbl_clubs set ownerId = #{ownerId} where clubCode = #{clubCode}
mapper.select: select clubName, clubCode, clubDate, ownerId from ( select rownum rn, clubName, clubCode, clubDate, ownerId from tbl_clubs where ( clubName like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or ownerId like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by clubDate desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from tbl_clubs where ( clubName like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or ownerId like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
